trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a field across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que os componentes podem usar para acessar informações sobre um campo entre o domínio do aplicativo e os limites do processo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract> represents a field of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract> representa um campo de um objeto remoto que implementa o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

trans-unit.source: To access one or more fields of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar um ou mais campos de um objeto remoto, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> que representa o tipo do objeto remoto.
Em seguida, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetField%2A> ou <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetFields%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the field that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o campo que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData" /> that provides information about the field that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData" /> que fornece informações sobre o campo que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData> structure includes an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that specifies the type of the field.
trans-unit.target: As informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData> estrutura inclui um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> que especifica o tipo do campo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> that identifies the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> que identifica o objeto que contém o campo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the field that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor do campo que este <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the field value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> que especifica o valor do campo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> that identifies the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> que identifica o objeto que contém o campo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the field value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> que especifica o valor do campo.

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the field will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
trans-unit.target: A identificação de localidade que o campo usará para as conversões de tipo específicas de localidade.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the field that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do campo que esse <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract" /> representa.
